Home » Projects

Projects

Helium

A tiny library that makes HTML interactive. It was inspired by AlpineJS and HTMX and does most of what they do but with a much smaller footprint. Also a drop-in lighter and more feature-rich replacement for Stimulus.

Ruby Monkey

A small utility library that helps make JavaScript do more Ruby. Adds all your favourite Ruby methods to Strings, Numbers, Arrays, Objects and Dates!

Swifty

A static site generator that uses Turbo to make a page navigation almost instant.

Fruit & Veg Cipher

A fun game - break the secret code.

Priority

A simple task manager to help you focus on what's important.

Authentication With Registration Generator Gem

Adds registration pages and some extra methods to the built-in authentication generator.

Nanny State

A tiny state library for building reactive UI.

This site was made with Swifty, the super speedy static site generator © DAZ 2026
